examples.example: 我今天买了新鲜的生菜，准备做一道美味又健康的沙拉。

translate.english: I bought fresh lettuce today and am going to make a delicious and healthy salad.

examples.example: 我和朋友们在菜园里一起采摘新鲜的生菜，感受大自然的美好。

translate.english: I picked fresh lettuce together with my friends in the vegetable garden and felt the beauty of nature.

examples.example: 看着那片绿油油的生菜，仿佛看到了大自然赐予我们的鲜活与美好。

translate.english: Looking at that piece of green lettuce, it seems to see the freshness and beauty that nature has bestowed on us.
